directions: In a small bowl, mix your flour, Splenda, cocoa powder and baking soda. Stir well to combine.
Add in your yogurt, milk, vanilla and dark chocolate chips. Mix until the batter is smooth.
Pour brownie batter into a small ramekin or coffee mug that has been well-coated with PAM.
ingredients: 1 T fat free yogurt (I used Fage 0% Greek yogurt)
1 T milk (I used unsweetened vanilla almond milk)
title: SLENDER SINGLE SERVING MUG BROWNIE
